text: Lady in the Iron Mask is a 1952 American adventure movie directed by Ralph Murphy. It is based on the last section of the novel The Vicomte de Bragelonne by Alexandre Dumas, p√®re. It stars Louis Hayward, Patricia Medina, Alan Hale Jr., Judd Holdren and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1952 movies Category:American adventure movies
title: Lady in the Iron Mask
